alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 14 at 2:09AM PST until January 15 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches in the valleys and 6 to 12 inches in the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range, White Pine County and Northeastern Nye County. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 4 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Nye County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; White Pine County
